text: Ne bamugamba nti, “Katonda w’Abaebbulaniya yatulabikira. Tukusaba otuleke tugende olugendo lwa nnaku ssatu mu ddungu, tuweeyo ssaddaaka eri Mukama Katonda waffe;5:3 Abamisiri baatwalanga ensolo ng’ente okuba ensolo ezawongebwa, era ekyo kye kyagendererwa mu kugenda olugendo okuva awaali Abamisiri, okuwaayo ssaddaaka (laba 8:22) aleme kututta ne kawumpuli, oba n’ekitala.”
